content.text:
# Kingsley Wickramaratne

Kingsley Tissa Wickramaratne (died 2008, aged 75) was the 5th Governor of Southern Province, Sri Lanka. Wickramaratne held the position from 1 February 2002, through 23 October 2006, when he was replaced by Kumari Balasuriya.
